fields_of_interest: Consumers, Customs, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Provides yearly international symposium which brings together stakeholders involved in all aspects of the product supply chain to facilitate the discussion of product safety for educational training, best practices and networking.
organisation_name: International Consumer Product Health and Safety Organization (ICPHSO)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: ICPHSO is an international, neutral forum for product safety stakeholders to learn, network and share information. ICPHSO is the only organization which attracts a global membership of health and safety professionals which meets annually to exchange ideas, share information, and address health and safety concerns affecting all consumers.
industry_forums: ICPHSO is conducting a two day product safety workshop -  "Alignment and Inclusion in a Divergent World" in conjunction with the EC.  Workshops and panels during the two day workshop will feature experts in product safety to provided training and educational guidance on designing, importing, manufacturing and selling safe consumer products that meet the requirements of global regulators through best practices.
inter_groups: Through the ICPHSO International Symposium we interact with members of the EU who often will send representatives from their member states to participate on panels and attend product safety education and training sessions during the Symposium.
relevant_communication: Provides support for yearly international symposium to bring stakeholders involved in product safety in all aspects of the supply chain together to discuss best practices and for networking.
